step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Great job maintaining the position.
Smooth return to the starting position. You're reversing the motion effectively.
Second rep, starting strong with hands clasped in your lap.
Good upward movement. Focus on keeping those elbows tucked in as you raise your hands.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep that upright posture.
Holding the stretch. You're doing great maintaining the position.
You've completed the exercise! Smoothly returned to the start.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands and maintaining an upright head position throughout. Overall, your movements were smooth and controlled, promoting good shoulder and chest flexibility.
